docs.lead_paragraph: In the syndicate, it's the stomach that gave us the big payoff. It was Big Barney's idea to ''go for the gut,'' as he put it. He had a vision of where the money was, Big Barney. Little Mike wanted to go for the legs and lungs. ''There's a mint in the legs and lungs,'' he said. And Medium Al, always looking for the middle way, wanted to go for the taste buds.

docs.lead_paragraph: Mrs. Cuomo on Nutrition Matilda Cuomo, wife of the Governor, paid a visit to the nutrition education resource project at Columbia University Teachers College last week. Her interest in nutrition and health education goes back to her days as a teacher in the New York schools, and now she is chairman of the state Council on Children and Families, ''It's ironic,'' she said, ''but the school districts that need the information about health the most, the impoverished areas, don't have it. The areas where they don't need it, because the children get it at home, provide the information. I'm all for teaching prevention from kindergarten on because the best gift we can give these children is an appreciation of the importance of soundness of mind and body.''
